Name: Flight Of Nova
About the game: Flight of Nova is a space and atmospheric flight simulator in which you control spacecraft on and around NVA-31, a full-scale planet. You will fly an assortment of craft doing transport and search missions in an environment with realistic aerodynamics and orbital physics. Flight Of Nova features two gameplay modes: Multiple maps containing a series of missions and Rogue Mode (Free Mode). Key Features: * Realistic gravitation and orbital physics * Atmospheric density inspired by earth data * Aerodynamic drag corresponding to vessel shape * Drag / air friction energy calculations * Real-time accurate orbital data * Orbital stations and docking system * Planet surface outposts * Real-time control over spacecraft * Full-scale body diameter 12â€™700 km * Search and transport missions * Quick flight challenges * HOTAS support
